info.name: AW API Coding Test - Shorten - Sachin
info.description:
## IMPORTANT

Please pay attention to the **API Specification** and implement as instructed.

### Request Structure

The request payload/body must match as the API Specification.

### Response Structure

- All the endpoints must return JSON response
    
- The response examples included in this documentation are for successful requests only.
    
- For any other requests that fails, **please return appropriate response with appropriate response code.**

response.name: Sing Up Validation Issue

request.description: API Endpoint to authenticate and obtain authentication token.
